Data Fields

uint32_t baseAddress
 Base address of the CBUFF module.
 
uint32_t fifoBaseAddress
 CBUFF FIFO Base address: This is the EDMA3/DSS base address.

 CBUFF EDMA Physical Channel Identifier:
 
uint32_t adcBaseAddress
 Base address of the ADC Buffer: This should be the address as seen by the EDMA3/DSS.
 
uint32_t cpSingleChirpInterleavedAddress [4]
 Single Chirp Interleaved Base address of the Chirp Parameter: This should be the address as seen by the EDMA3/DSS.
 
uint32_t cpSingleChirpNonInterleavedAddress [4]
 Single Chirp Non-Interleaved Base address of the Chirp Parameter: This should be the address as seen by the EDMA3/DSS.
 
uint32_t cpMultipleChirpNonInterleavedAddress [8]
 Multiple Chirp Non-Interleaved Base address of the Chirp Parameter: This should be the address as seen by the EDMA3/DSS.
 
uint32_t csiProtocolEngineAddress
 Base address of the CSI Protocol Engine register space.
 
uint8_t maxLVDSLanesSupported
 Maximum number of LVDS Lanes which are supported.
 
uint32_t errorInterrupt
 CBUFF Error Interrupt Number.
 
uint32_t cbuffInterrupt
 CBUFF Interrupt Number.
 
uint32_t frameStartInterrupt
 CBUFF Frame Start Interrupt.
 
uint32_t chirpModeStartIndex
 CBUFF Chirp Mode Start Index: This is the range of chirp modes which are supported by the platform.
 
uint32_t chirpModeEndIndex
 CBUFF Chirp Mode End Index: This is the range of chirp modes which are supported by the platform.
 

Detailed Description

CBUFF Hardware Attributes.

The structure contains the hardware atrributes which are used to specify the platform specific configurations.
